flawed_nl_solution:
Jenny needs to print 7*25= <<7*25=175>>175 pages.
This will cost 175*$0.1 =$<<175*0.1=17.5>>17.5.
The pens will cost 7*$1.5=$<<7*1.5=10.5>>10.5.
In total, she will spend $17.5+$10.5=$<<17.5+10.5=27>>27.
Since she pays with 2 twenty dollar bills she pays with 2*20=<<2*20=40>>40 dollars.
Thus, she will get $40-$27=$<<40-27=13>>13 in change.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 27. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
